page.title: 04Housing in N/Hamm/Coll P
page.content: Most of the housing in the College park and north Hammersmith are either flats or houses. Many houses in the east of the area are divided into flats and single rooms made into bedsits.The inhabitants share kitchen and bathrooms. Most of the inhabitants are immigrants or people from other parts of the country stopping off for a while in West London.In the south of the area the area is mainly flats of between two and five storeys high.In the west the housing consists mainly of houses terraced and semi-detached,consisting of two,three and four bedrooms.The north of the area is all indusrtrial, with no housing at all.
